reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater cute, soft, and comfortable, with one mentioning it creates a balanced look.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sweater
items.body: Good quality. Fits true to size. Comfortable yet elegant. Very flattering Read more
items.author: Joy Williams

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Do not like material
items.body: Not the greatest fit material awful Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Soft, warm figure flattering sweater for curvy girls.
items.body: This is a thicker material sweater with a soft, draped look that is so figure flattering on the right body type. I purchased the gray/black version and the camel colored option at Christmas and I gifted both of them - one to my daughter and one to my mother. They each tried them on and immediately reported that they didn’t like the look of the sweater on their frames. I collected both sweaters with the intent of returning them, but I really liked the color and style of each of them, so I tried them on, and I LOVE them on my body shape. I’m more endowed in the bust than both intended recipients, so I think that’s what made the difference. Both of these sweaters have such a flattering style on my body type that accentuates my curves and gives me an hourglass shape. It is a thicker sweater material and you do have to take a minute to adjust the wrap style drape folds in the front, but once you do, you see the magic happen. My only complaint is that I have to periodically adjust the front wrap and I think it’s just a bit short and would appreciate a tad more length in the torso. Neither issue takes away from the overall look though, so I’m very satisfied with the style on me. I’m so glad that I took a minute to try them on before returning them because I’d have missed out on a great purchase. The soft folds and ruching drape style in this front wrap style sweater definitely has a slimming effect and complements my shape nicely. Definitely worth trying for yourself!! I took away one star because it needs readjusting every so often, and could really use a bit more length in the waist. Read more
items.author: Loretta Kalita

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice sweater
items.body: Love the fit and style of the sweater. It’s well made and great thickness for someone like me who is always chilly. Fits true to size. Well worth the $31 I paid for it. I would purchase it again. Read more
items.author: Cindy P

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Way to short for this design
items.body: Super pretty sweater but way to short for an XL. If a person orders an XL, at least make it long enough to cover the belly. If I have to pull it down just to barely cover myself then I pull out all the pleats and it's no longer pretty Read more
items.author: jhans

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not
items.body: Just as described and soft. Read more
items.author: notXmyXfault

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good
items.body: Warm good fit reasonable quality Read more
items.author: Marion G

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not flattering
items.body: Super bulky around the middle, and made me look fatter then I am. Uncomfortable and hot. I never wore it. Read more
items.author: Heidi Smith

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Ruched Off Shoulder Long Sleeve V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Ruched Off Shoulder Long Sleeve V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Pure Camel, Plain Black, Pure Khaki, Plain Grey, Black and White, Plain Khaki, Pure Dark Green, Pure Teal Blue, Plain Brown, Plain Apricot. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
